channel.title: Anonymous Elite Open Player on The Huddle
channel.description: Recent content in Anonymous Elite Open Player on The Huddle

item.title: My Turn As That Guy
item.description: I know a lot of your other articles are going to be from people that always do the right thing, but not everyone is them. I thank you for letting me write from my perspective without, I think, giving people the wrong impression about my team. But I think it is important that you get all sides here. I cheated in a game-to-go. When I made the call I thought it was correct but I knew right then about ten seconds later that it was wrong.
